name: Food Chomp (CM)
description:
WARNING: Contains belly expansion fetish material.

Hello again! Here's a commissioned project from Awesomesir, featuring assets they created! Chompy's setting out to eat as much of the food inexplicably flying around as possible, to the point of bursting (if that setting's activated, which it is by default).

Instructions:
Make sure the button on the warning screen reflects your preference for popping (it's active by default)
Press R to restart (Refresh the page to change settings on the HTML version),
WASD to move,
Spacebar to jump
Score is increased by eating food and reduced by missing food
